project.name: kollavarsham
project.description: Convert Gregorian date to Kollavarsham date and vice versa

baseDate.name: baseDate
baseDate.description: Defines the {{#crossLink "BaseDate"}}{{/crossLink}} which is inherited by {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} and {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} classes

kollavarsham.name: kollavarsham
kollavarsham.description: The main module that exposes all of the public API in the library

BaseDate.name: BaseDate
BaseDate.description:
Serves as the base class for both the {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} and
{{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} classes.

 **INTERNAL/PRIVATE**

JulianDate.name: JulianDate
JulianDate.description:
Represents a Julian date's year, month and day

 **INTERNAL/PRIVATE**

KollavarshamDate.name: KollavarshamDate
KollavarshamDate.description: Represent's a Kollavarsham date's year, month and date

Kollavarsham.name: Kollavarsham
Kollavarsham.description:
The Kollavarsham class implements all the public APIs of the library.

Create a new instance of this class, passing in the relevant options and call methods on the instance.

params.name: options
params.description: A set of key value pairs to configure the Kollavarsham instance. All settings are optional.

props.name: system
props.description: Set to 'InPancasiddhantika' or 'SuryaSiddhanta' to use the corresponding system

props.name: latitude
props.description: Sets the latitude for the location for the conversions. Defaults to Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh

props.name: longitude
props.description: Sets the longitude for the location for the conversions. Default to Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh

classitems.description: Converts the Date to a nicely formatted string with year, month and date
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: Holds the settings state of the Kollavarsham instance. To access a snapshot use the {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/getSettings:method"}}{{/crossLink}} method
classitems.name: settings

classitems.description: Gets a snapshot of the current settings
classitems.name: getSettings

classitems.description: Sets the system to be either 'InPancasiddhantika' or 'SuryaSiddhanta'
classitems.name: setSystem

classitems.description:
Sets the latitude for the location that will be used as the basis for the conversion.
The value of the latitude parameter should be within -90 to +90
classitems.name: setLatitude

classitems.description:
Sets the longitude for the location that will be used as the basis of the conversion
The value of the latitude parameter should be within -180 to +180
classitems.name: setLongitude

classitems.description: Converts a Gregorian date to the equivalent Kollavarsham date, respecting the current configuration
classitems.name: fromGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Gregorian date to be converted to Kollavarsham

classitems.description:
Converts a Kollavarsham date to its equivalent Gregorian date, respecting the current configuration.
This method Will return {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} object for any date before 1st January 1583 AD and
[Date](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date) objects for later dates.

 **This API has not been implemented yet**
classitems.name: toGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Kollavarsham date to be converted to Gregorian

throws.description: When the API is implemented, will convert <date>

classitems.description:
Exports the {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class for referencing via `require`. This is the class
that is returned when converting {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/fromGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}} and is passed in
to {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/toGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}}. See example below.
classitems.name: kollavarshamDate

warnings.message: replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
